p: Human-derived partial NS3 WNV sequences were compared via their identity scores. The preliminary matrix file was generated using the Sequence Demarcation Tool for Windows [ 26] (SDT version 1.2, www.cbio.uct.ac.za/SDT). The matrix file was edited using R software, specifically the heatmap function. Dendrogram was added with the Euclidean index and Single linkage algorithm [ 27].
